name: WhenIs
0:
”Alexa, open when is”
”when is Thanksgiving”
”when is Diwali”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: when is
des:
Looking for a skill that tells you the date a festival or event is and how many days to go? If yes, then you found the right skill.
New events are being added regularly. Please provide feedback and let know what kind of events do you want to added to this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
